description: Poor Jay! After he cums to a video of a girl in a school girl outfit getting spanked, he falls asleep and dreams of the exact same thing. Except his dream girl Vanessa is a sadistic brat who takes no shit and laughs gleefully as she kicks Jay in the balls, torments and smacks his cock and balls and makes him worship her feet. But she is so not done. Next, Vanessa magically sports a big strap on and pegs Jay hard and heavy. Where else is this kinky, super weird rollercoaster of a dream going to go? Jay is helpless, and can’t stop the nightmarish ride…. (Part 2 of 4) This scene is a 2021 AVN Award nominee for Best Special Effects
title: Fetish Dreamland (2 of 4)
